article: Students in No. 9 Middle School are very happy every day. They have many kinds of  _  . They can do  many  things after school. For example, Lin Tao likes  _   very much, especially   basketball. He often  _ basketball games on TV. So he joins  the   _    club. Wang Li likes opera very much. She wants to join the  Beijing Opera  club. Most students can join their favorite clubs. But  _ some students, it is difficult to choose   one. Zhang Ling likes music very much. She     _  likes movies very much. Will she join the music club or the _ club? She doesn't  _  . Can you help her?
